Name: Porcuball
About the game: Porcuball is a physics based puzzle game where players take the role of Quill, the porcupine. Roll up items left behind by lazy campers to get past obstacles and maneuver through the woods to your ultimate goal...their coolers. Every stage will give players unique challenges to solve for in an open ended way. Roll around the woods and use anything that Quill can get his sticky little paws on to solve environmental puzzles. Use camper's gear, leftovers, or even your fellow woodland creatures to jump, climb, burn, or even pole vault to glory and those sweet sweet campfire meals. Sticky Situations Explore all the possibilities in the Campground Be a pyromaniac in Flaming Shores Break down walls in the Crazy Cave Try not to be the next toasted porcupine in the Floor is Lava
